info.title: Website Profile Disbudporapar API
info.description: API untuk Elektronik Survei Kepuasan Masyarakat (E-SKM) Pemerintah Kabupaten Katingan. Digunakan untuk mengelola autentikasi pengguna, data pengguna, dan survei kepuasan terhadap layanan perangkat daerah.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of item that needs to be displayed

post.description: Authenticate user and return a token
Logout user and revoke access token

get.summary: Retrieve a single banner by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Banner to update

items.example: The Banner Title field is required.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of Organization Categories
Retrieve a single Organization Category by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the organization categories to update

items.example: The Organization Categories field is required.

delete.description: Delete a Organization Categories by ID

400.description: Category cannot be deleted because it is being used by one or more organizations

message.example: Category cannot be deleted because it is being used by one or more organizations

get.summary: Retrieve a list of Download files
Retrieve a single Download file by ID
Retrieve a single gallery galery ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Gallery to update

items.example: The Gallery Title field is required.

get.summary: Retrieve a single Identity by ID
Retrieve a single News by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the News to update

items.example: The News Title field is required.

get.summary: Retrieve a single Organization by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the organization to update

items.example: The Organization Name field is required.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who created the survey

bearerAuth.description: Enter your Bearer token in the format: Bearer <token>
